effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.

short_effect.sun-moon: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The move’s type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The move’s type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The move’s type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.
